trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Newark
There were no other sightings in Newark on or around July 9th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside to see what the neighbors were looking at and saw a reflective ball like object moving thru the sky at slow speeds and watched it moves over the house and across town out of our sight. We took a picture of it as best as we could and it definately shows its shape. Has no wings or trail of smoke behind it.
Summary: Saw our neighbors looking and pointing in the sky so i went outside to see what it was thhey were looking at assuming a plane and saw a reflective ball shaped object moving slower than a ny planes Ive seen fly through the sky.
